name: Simply Core
description:
This is a FPP game in small openworld. Survive with ammo till the end.

More screenshots and gameplay trailer in progress... (PROBABLY can grow a littlebit more, but firstly I need to boost up my workmashine, cause on first screenshots graphic quality is pushed down because in editor mode maked more easly, so there haven't any light effects, no grass, simple terrain etc...)

If you want you can get it for free to test and claim your observation results.

Just send an e-mail to me if you like to test it on your BIGGER mashine (my pc doesn't work well with this title - strong pc recommended!)

Nice to be hearen after upcomming update !
